documentation.title: Language Construct Spacing
documentation.standard: Language constructs that can be used without parentheses, must have a single space between the language construct keyword and its content.

code.title: Valid: Single space after language construct.
Invalid: No space, more than one space or newline after language construct.

documentation.standard: A single space must be used between the "yield" and "from" keywords for a "yield from" expression.

code.title: Valid: Single space between yield and from.
Invalid: No space, more than one space or newline between yield and from.
